document.full_text: andy greene's goal with 4 minutes 56 seconds left snapped a tie and lifted the devils to a 3-2 win over the islanders in newark on wednesday night, keeping the devils alive in the playoff race.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: devils stay alive, barely, by beating islanders
lines_and_colors: andy greene's goal with 4 minutes 56 seconds left snapped a tie and lifted the devils to a 3-2 win over the islanders in newark on wednesday night, keeping the devils alive in the playoff race.
